div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1092 Kerch' (anc. Panticapaeum), 1879 Burial: c. 275-225 B.C. Contents: 17 AE. Pot hoard Panticapaeum: AE (as BMC 28-29, some struck over BMC 23) Disposition: museum material lost during war DAK 1879, pp. 16, 62 Possibly from the same hd. as no. 1070
